translated_text:
Chokwe: Miseenge kuyapwile wikha yize yilyi nhi wukekemeno wa meya, yapwa kucinga nhi yize yilyi mbunga mumiseenge yinene yapwile kucinga nhi Ganges. 
English:: The river: The Ganges is the only river to flow entirely through a desert.

text: Katalilo wa linhica lia cifuci cesue, ha milimoyakutalatala shimbu, ya ifuci yalicinga, kasoluelenhiumwe linhika kuyslândia ha phoso ya kunhima.
translated_text:
Chokwe: Katalilo wa linhica lia cifuci cesue, ha milimoyakutalatala shimbu, ya ifuci yalicinga, kasoluelenhiumwe linhika kuyslândia ha phoso ya kunhima. 
English:: The result: The blade of the knife is dull, not the metal of the handle, and the blade will soon become useless if it is not replaced.

text: Kanahwimina kusongo lya mulundu kucivumbuko ca Meca, thanda yahululu kushi nawa nhiwume muthu wa kucifuci cekha.
translated_text:
Chokwe: Kanahwimina kusongo lya mulundu kucivumbuko ca Meca, thanda yahululu kushi nawa nhiwume muthu wa kucifuci cekha. 
English:: Tomb of the Prophet Muhammad: This is the largest tomb in the world, and it is the only tomb that has a minaret.
